Header: Hemasiri and Pujith will be remanded till the 9th of this month
Content: The trial against former Defence Secretary, Hemasiri Fernando and the IGP Pujith Jayasundera commenced at 11.30 a.m. today before the Colombo Chief Magistrateâ€™s court. The Chief Magistrate ordered to remand the two suspects till the 9th of this month. The two suspects were not produced before the court as they have admitted to hospitals due to poor health condition. The Attorney General had advised the Acting IGP to apprehend Pujith Jayasundera and Hemasiri Fernando in connection with investigations being done on Easter Sunday attacks. Accordingly, the two suspects were arrested yesterday at hospitals. The trial commenced after detaining them at the remand custody.
